name: YourCMS
summary: A tiny content management system with allows it to give users webspace
short_description:
YourCMS is a little content management system. It isn't created for little homepages, but for administrators that want to give their users space for their homepages. The administrator can switch if the users can register themselves or if they have to be created by the administrator.
The users can create text pages, choose a design and can upload files.
Can be used for only one private homepage, but is not recommended as the focus of the project lies on other things.
